Consider replacing `android:layout_marginLeft` with `android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/gnt_default_margin"` to better support right-to-left layouts
Use "`start`" instead of "`left`" to ensure correct behavior in right-to-left locales
Consider replacing `android:paddingLeft` with `android:paddingStart="@dimen/gnt_default_margin"` to better support right-to-left layouts
